tool_description:
This API is a simple ROgue Company API made with info found online on different resources.
It started as a personal project, but given that there seems to be no official API, I decided to make a fan based one and make it public.
name: RoCO API
title: RoCO API

api_list.name: Get Image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://roco-api.p.rapidapi.com/images/b9eee8a0-70.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "roco-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://roco-api.p.rapidapi.com/images/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "roco-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
